ygData.subject: Re: Amendment to North Qeynos Auction/Trade Show
ygData.msgSnippet: Just to let you know, I went ahead and posted the full notice, for the invite of all Races on the Bristlebane_OOC mailing list.  Remember the one that seceeded
ygData.messageBody:
Just to let you know, I went ahead and posted the full notice, for the invite of

all Races on the Bristlebane_OOC mailing list. Remember the one that seceeded
from our union? I am a bit of a, shall we say, a knowledge broker, and have
taken residence on both sides of the border. So I just wanted to let you know
that the word has spread to the rebels too. ;p

Zakrul The Traveler
Companion
Wizard

-----------------------------------------------------
This mail sent through IMP: http://web.horde.org/imp/
